data.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
data.author: Leo Tolstoy

data.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
data.author: Margaret Mead

data.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
data.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

data.quote: I am large--I contain multitudes.
data.author: Walt Whitman

data.quote: We are the change that we seek.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind.
data.author: Friedrich Neitzsche

data.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
data.author: Andy Warhol

data.quote: I have accepted fear as part of life --specifically the fear of change. I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says 'turn back'.
data.author: Erica Jong

data.quote: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
data.author: George Bernard Shaw

data.quote: Stepping onto a brand new path is difficult, but not more difficult than remaining in a situation which is not nurturing to the whole woman.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: We are not trapped or locked up in these bones. No, no. We are free to change.
data.author: Walter Mosley

data.quote: Some changes look negative on the surface, but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
data.author: Eckhart Tolle

data.quote: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: We are products of our past, but we do not have to be prisoners of it.
data.author: Rick Warren

data.quote: Destiny is not a matter of chance; it is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for. It is a thing to be achieved.
data.author: William Jennings Bryan

data.quote: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses and start making changes.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
data.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

data.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
data.author: Milton Berle

data.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
data.author: Winston S. Churchill
